Name: Holovid Series: Female Slavers Of Dariah
Details: The Female Slavers of Dariah are a series of pulp adventure and erotica holovids set the Deep Periphery fictional world of Dariah, somewhere near the Federated Suns, where a group of amazon women hijack JumpShips to kidnap male travelers and take them half-unwillingly to a number of adventures. Strong viewer discretion is highly recommended while watching the series, as it has been banned by the New Avalon Catholic Church and placed on its index of censored books.
